MOTION TO ADJOURN; Congressional Record Vol. 167, No. 35

congVote.result: So the motion to adjourn was rejected.
congVote.dailyDigestSummary: Rejected the Greene (GA) motion to adjourn by a yea-and-nay vote of 202 yeas to 214 nays, Roll No. 33.

extension.searchTitle: MESSAGES FROM THE PRESIDENT; Congressional Record Vol. 167, No. 35

titleInfo.title: PROVIDING FOR CONSIDERATION OF H.R. 803, COLORADO WILDERNESS ACT OF 2021, AND PROVIDING FOR CONSIDERATION OF H.R. 5, EQUALITY ACT

extension.searchTitle: PROVIDING FOR CONSIDERATION OF H.R. 803, COLORADO WILDERNESS ACT OF 2021, AND PROVIDING FOR CONSIDERATION OF H.R. 5, EQUALITY ACT; Congressional Record Vol. 167, No. 35

congVote.result: So the previous question was ordered.
congVote.dailyDigestCategory2: Colorado Wilderness Act of 2021 and Equality Act_Rule for Consideration
congVote.dailyDigestSummary: Rejected the Greene (GA) motion to adjourn by a yea-and-nay vote of 202 yeas to 214 nays, Roll No. 33.<P/>The House agreed to H. Res. 147, providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 803) to designate certain lands in the State of Colorado as components of the National Wilderness Preservation System, and providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 5) to prohibit discrimination on the basis of sex, gender identity, and sexual orientation, by a yea-and-nay vote of 218 yeas to 208 nays, Roll No. 35, after the previous question was ordered by a yea-and-nay vote of 219 yeas to 211 nays, Roll No. 34.

congVote.result: So the resolution was agreed to.
congVote.dailyDigestCategory2: Colorado Wilderness Act of 2021 and Equality Act_Rule for Consideration
congVote.dailyDigestSummary: Rejected the Greene (GA) motion to adjourn by a yea-and-nay vote of 202 yeas to 214 nays, Roll No. 33.<P/>The House agreed to H. Res. 147, providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 803) to designate certain lands in the State of Colorado as components of the National Wilderness Preservation System, and providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 5) to prohibit discrimination on the basis of sex, gender identity, and sexual orientation, by a yea-and-nay vote of 218 yeas to 208 nays, Roll No. 35, after the previous question was ordered by a yea-and-nay vote of 219 yeas to 211 nays, Roll No. 34.

titleInfo.title: EFFECTIVE ASSISTANCE OF COUNSEL IN THE DIGITAL ERA ACT

extension.searchTitle: EFFECTIVE ASSISTANCE OF COUNSEL IN THE DIGITAL ERA ACT; Congressional Record Vol. 167, No. 35

congVote.result: So (two-thirds being in the affirmative) the rules were suspended and the bill was passed.
congVote.dailyDigestCategory2: Effective Assistance of Counsel in the Digital Era Act
congVote.dailyDigestSummary: The House agreed to suspend the rules and pass the following measures. Consideration began Tuesday, February 23rd.<P/>H.R. 546, to regulate monitoring of electronic communications between an incarcerated person in a Bureau of Prisons facility and that person's attorney or other legal representative, by a \2/3\ yea-and-nay vote of 414 yeas to 11 nays, Roll No. 36; and

titleInfo.title: PUERTO RICO RECOVERY ACCURACY IN DISCLOSURES ACT OF 2021

extension.searchTitle: PUERTO RICO RECOVERY ACCURACY IN DISCLOSURES ACT OF 2021; Congressional Record Vol. 167, No. 35

congVote.result: So (two-thirds being in the affirmative) the rules were suspended and the bill was passed.
congVote.dailyDigestCategory2: Puerto Rico Recovery Accuracy in Disclosures Act of 2021
congVote.dailyDigestSummary: The House agreed to suspend the rules and pass the following measures. Consideration began Tuesday, February 23rd.<P/>H.R. 1192, to impose requirements on the payment of compensation to professional persons employed in voluntary cases commenced under title III of the Puerto Rico Oversight Management and Economic Stability Act (commonly known as ``PROMESA''), by a \2/3\ yea-and-nay vote of 429 yeas with none voting ``nay'', Roll No. 37.
